<S%G1161>"But<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G5043><s%> 'Son, <S%G3415>remember<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G4771>you,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2222>lifetime,<s%> <S%G618>received<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> good <S%G18>things,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2976>Lazarus,<s%> in the <S%G3668>same<s%> <S%G2556>way,<s%> bad things. <S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> here <S%G3592>he<s%> is <S%G3870>comforted<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G4771>you<s%> are in <S%G3600>anguish.<s%>
